attributes.action: lower the age of smear tests to allow girls of 16 and above
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We think that as girls are legally sexually active from the age of 16, and even before the age of 16, that a smear test should be available to those who feel they need one. Jade Goody is a prime example of young woman not being aware of how dangerous it can be. We are 17 and 18 years of age and think that we should have the right to a smear test.

rejection.details:
Hi Rebecca and Levi

Thanks for you petition, but we already have one on the site covering this subject. Please see:

http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Smears16/

Kind Regards

E-Petitions Team
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
